questions: Review this code snippet and point out any security issue: const query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE name='" + req.body.name + "'";
Identify the bug in this TypeScript function: function foo(bar: any) { return bar.baz; }
answers: The query is vulnerable to SQL injection. Use parameterized queries.
If bar is undefined, accessing baz will throw an error. Add a null check or proper typing.
